description.value:
The worm makes two bite attacks, or uses its Trill and makes a bite attack.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 3d8 + @mod type=piercing average=true]] damage plus [[/damage 3d6 type=cold average=true]] damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a [[/save dex 20 format=long]] or be swallowed by the worm. A swallowed creature is &Reference[blinded]{blinded} and &Reference[restrained]{restrained}, has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the worm, and takes [[/damage 3d6 type=acid average=true]] damage and [[/damage 3d6 type=cold average=true]] damage at the start of each of the wormâ€™s turns.

If the worm takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the worm must succeed on a [[/save con 20 format=long]] at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall &Reference[prone]{prone} in a space within 10 feet of the worm.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

The frost worm emits a haunting cry. Each creature within 60 feet of the worm that can hear it must succeed on a [[/save wis 20 format=long]] or be &Reference[stunned]{stunned} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw each time it takes damage and at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. Once a creature successfully saves against this effect, or if this effect ends for it, that creature is immune to the Trill of all frost worms for the next 24 hours. Frost worms are immune to this effect.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.

Freezing Body. A creature that touches the worm or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes [[/damage 3d6 type=cold average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Death Burst. When the worm dies, it explodes in a burst of frigid energy. Each creature within 60 feet of it must make a [[/save dex 20 format=long]], taking [[/damage 8d6 type=cold average=true]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Creatures inside the worm when it dies automatically fail this saving throw.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.

Tunneler. The worm can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].
